argument.name: Index as N
argument.description: The index of the session-state variable to be removed. This index is zero based.

page.description: Removes the item at the specified 0-based index from the session-state collection.
page.discussion: Context.Session.RemoveAt() removes the item at the specified 0-based index from the session-state collection. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
